name: Agentic Web Scraper
author: AWENK AUDICO & Gemini
description: Deploys an autonomous AI agent to navigate websites, interact with elements, and extract information to fulfill a high-level objective.

properties.label: loc.prop_manual_objective_label
properties.default: Find the top 3 latest news about AI technology from detik.com

properties.label: loc.prop_max_steps_label
properties.description: Maximum number of actions the agent can take to prevent infinite loops.

properties.label: loc.prop_ai_brain_label
properties.description: The AI model that will act as the agent's brain for decision making.

output_schema.name: data.agent_final_answer
output_schema.description: The final processed information extracted by the AI agent.

output_schema.name: data.interaction_log
output_schema.description: A step-by-step log of the agent's actions and observations.
